attributes.action: Stand with Ahed Tamimi and free her from the Israelis
attributes.additional_details: The soldiers wanted to go into her house to shoot at children for playing near her house. Ahed is facing 12 chargers for simply standing up against the Israelis. Ahed is only 17 years old.
attributes.background: The Palestinians have been under occupation for 50 years by the Israelis. They have stripped them of their basic human rights and killed them. Ahed is an activist who protected her land and house from Israeli soldiers and got arrested. She may spend 10 years in jail for slapping the  soldier.
